name: rarecube.tv
description: RARE□TV is dedicated to reshaping digital broadcasting by eliminating centralized gatekeepers. Our mission is to establish a more equitable and transparent ecosystem in which creators decide the pace. We deliver tools that enable dynamic, community-led experiences aligned with the advancing paradigm of creator rewards, fungible and non-fungible monetization—while driving both cross-chain and open-source initiatives for emerging "creator capital" markets.
